Dateable Interface Reference

Defines methods that are useful for objects that can be dated. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 human_readable_date ()
 Returns a formatted date, suitable to be read by humans.

 Returns a RFC2822 formatted date for the creation date of the receiver, useful for feeds.

 Returns a ISO8601 formatted date for the creation date of the receiver, useful for feeds.

Detailed Description

Defines methods that are useful for objects that can be dated.

Member Function Documentation

Dateable::human_readable_date (  ) 

Returns a formatted date, suitable to be read by humans.

Implemented in Query, AbstractComment, BlockedIp, DiarioPost, Outbound, ServerError, SoftwareRelease, and Visit.

Dateable::rfc2822_date (  ) 

Returns a RFC2822 formatted date for the creation date of the receiver, useful for feeds.

Implemented in Query, AbstractComment, BlockedIp, DiarioPost, Outbound, ServerError, SoftwareRelease, and Visit.

Dateable::iso8601_date (  ) 

Returns a ISO8601 formatted date for the creation date of the receiver, useful for feeds.

Implemented in Query, AbstractComment, BlockedIp, DiarioPost, Outbound, ServerError, SoftwareRelease, and Visit.
